hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa that :two men referred a dispute to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) concerning an animal, and neither of them had proof, so he ruled that it should be divided in half

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلاَنِ يَدَّعِيَانِ السِّلْعَةَ وَلَيْسَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَيِّنَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: When Two Men Claim Some Goods And Neither Of Them Has Any Proof
